item.title: Kate add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "If you can't dazzle them with brilliance, baffle them with bullshit." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Kate add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kate add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I would always rather be happy than dignified." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Kate add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kate add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "I'll try anything once, twice if I like it, three times to make sure." -- Mae West

item.title: Kate add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Life has become immeasurably better since I have been forced to stop taking it seriously." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Kate add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Kate add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "Men should think twice before making widowhood women's only path to power." -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Kate add a quote by Diane Arbus
item.description: "My favorite thing is to go where I've never been." -- Diane Arbus

item.title: Kate add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Live, travel, adventure, bless, and don't be sorry." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Kate add a quote by Jonathan Swift
item.description: "May you live every day of your life." -- Jonathan Swift

item.title: Kate add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kate add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "Courage is being scared to death, but saddling up anyway." -- John Wayne

item.title: Kate add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Kate add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "The most wasted of all days is one without laughter." -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Kate add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "Let me be, was all I wanted. Be what I am, no matter how I am." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Kate add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Monsters are real, and ghosts are real too. They live inside us, and sometimes, they win." -- Stephen King

item.title: Kate add a quote by Randy Pausch
item.description: "We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand." -- Randy Pausch

item.title: Kate add a quote by Henry Miller
item.description: "Develop an interest in life as you see it; the people, things, literature, music - the world is so rich, simply throbbing with rich treasures, beautiful souls and interesting people. Forget yourself." -- Henry Miller

item.title: Kate add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Kate add a quote by Marie Curie
item.description: "Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less." -- Marie Curie

item.title: Kate add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Kate add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Do it or don't. It's amazing how many things in life are that easy." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kate add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Nothing brings people together more than mutual hatred." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kate add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "People are best on records and books because you can turn them off or put them back on the shelf." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kate add a quote by Joss Whedon
Kate add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "I think we're all pretty crazy on this bus. I'm not sure I know anyone who's got all the dots on his or her dice." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Kate add a quote by Nora Ephron
item.description: "Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim." -- Nora Ephron

item.title: Kate add a quote by Neil deGrasse Tyson
item.description: "Not only do we live among the stars, the stars live within us." -- Neil deGrasse Tyson

item.title: Kate add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience." -- Eleanor Roosevelt
